title: J2EE Misconfiguration: Entity Bean Declared Remote
overview: When an application exposes a remote interface for an entity bean, it might also expose methods that get or set the bean&amp;#x27;s data. These methods could be leveraged to read sensitive information, or to change data in ways that violate the application&amp;#x27;s expectations, potentially leading to other vulnerabilities.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Declare Java beans local when possible. When a bean must be remotely accessible, make sure that sensitive information is not exposed, and ensure that the application logic performs appropriate validation of any data that might be modified by an attacker.::
